attributes.action: To allow people with fertility problems to be allowed 1 chance on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the way fertility option is wrong,I feel discriminated because my partner has children from a previous relationship and the fertility problem is with me. I don't think it is fair just because he has children i don't have a chance on the NHS. I and many other people in my situation do feel discriminated against and should be treated fairly and be allowed a chance to have a family of their own as many people can't afford the fee to go private.
